TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Donkuan, title = Donkuan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donkuan} }

S.FORM: Donkuan Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hualien ko Donkuan a niyaro', 151 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 553 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 541 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%, roma 10%.

Donkoan Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hoalien ko Donkoan a niyaro', 151 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 553 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 541 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%, roma 10%.
